channel.title: Concepts on Kubernetes Anywhere — for Everybody
channel.description: Recent content in Concepts on Kubernetes Anywhere — for Everybody

item.title: Concepts | Guard
item.description: Concepts Concepts help you learn about the different parts of the Guard and the abstractions it uses. Overview. Provides a conceptual introduction to Guard, including the problems it solves and its high-level architecture.

item.title: Overview | Guard
item.description: Guard Guard by AppsCode is a Kubernetes Webhook Authentication server. Using guard, you can log into your Kubernetes cluster using your Github or Google authentication token. Guard also sets authenticated user’s groups to his Github teams or Google groups. This allows cluster administrator to setup RBAC rules based on membership in Github teams or Google groups.
